name: The Corona Cure
description:
Create a cure by manipulating organisms!

You are a scientist who want to create the cure for the corona virus. You will need to do some researches, collect money, and mess with many different viruses in order to reach your objective.

Game created in three days for the quarantine game jam: " A lot of..."

Good luck in finding the cure!

Controls:

Use the mouse to sell cures, to navigates through your recipe book, and to select, and drop viruses.

Hint:
  • If you don't know how many viruses of each genre to put, you can always divide the percentages to obtain a ration. 
  • Ex:  40%/60% = 2/3, so you will need to put 2 virus of the first genre, and 3 virus of the second genre.
  • Always sell your cure when at max viruses to maximize your profits

If the game runs slowly on your browser, try using another one or download the windows version of the game (Down here)
